name: MarkdownReference
0:
”Alexa, What is the syntax for a heading in mark down.”
”Alexa, How do I make a table in mark down.”
”Alexa, What is a link in mark down.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mark down
des:
Quickly get the syntax for github markdown file.
Supplies instructions on how to make:
- Headers
- Emphasis (bold, italics, strike through)
- Lists (ordered, unordered)
- Links
- Images
- Code and Syntax Highlighting
- Tables
- Blockquotes
- Line Breaks
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
